email.subject: 3 upcoming academic positions at UCLouvain, Belgium (2 in software engineering, 1 in security)

body.call_to_action: Please forward this to high-profile candidates looking for a permanent position at a top university at the heart of Europe.

positions.description: The Computer Science department at UCLouvain (Belgium) will soon open three full-time faculty positions targeting excellent profiles in the following domains:

list.title: Position 3
areas: AI for security & security for AI

positions.seniority_levels: The three positions will be open to all seniority levels (assistant/associate or full).

highlights: A vibrant work environment just south of Brussels
A department with excellent research infrastructure and support
Moderate teaching load and access to excellent students
No need to speak French to apply (but willingness to learn in a few years if appointed)

application_details.expected_announcements: We expect vacancies to be announced on the UCLouvain job portal in early September, with a deadline a few weeks later for a standard application package (resume, teaching/research statement, etc.).
application_details.submission_platform: Applications will only be accepted on the UCLouvain job portal.

contact.title: department chair
contact.note: Pending this official publication, however, interested potential candidates are welcome to contact the department chair with any questions.
